topic.title: A request for port to haiku os.
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment
Can you please add a option to get ZeroNet working on haiku Os please, i am bigfan of the two 
initiatives.
But Haiku es a great Operating systema and there are other big good apps too, is a good way to propagate this initiative in people who love the risk in the testing. 

  * Operating system: _____ Haiku Os
  * Web browser: _____ WebPositive
  * Tor status: not available/always/disabled : Disabled
  * Opened port: yes/no    no
  * Special configuration: ____ It is not ported to haiku yet
 
There are a lot of librarys but i am not programer then i just get frustrated in that wish.

topic.title: Trying on haiku os
topic.body:
Hello there, i love zeronet and love haiku os, then i am trying to getting work both, and i find some errors tryng with  pip3.8 install -r requirements.txt 

i think this is the more big thing in all the log 

Building wheels for collected packages: gevent
  Building wheel for gevent (PEP 517) ...

i include that log here. 

https://pastebin.com/rZd7UZzn

please help me, as i think haiku should have all the requirements or there should be a way to gettin zeronet workin on haiku os.

1604066973_mirrored_skarmiglione_github.body:
I did ported it now, helped by someone there, was easy, now Haiku OS is working. 

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12539219/87907914-1f8d9b80-ca2b-11ea-8e3f-b5ae0037bde1.png)

Thanks

1604067984_mirrored_skarmiglione_github.body: https://github.com/gevent/gevent/issues/1658#issuecomment-658989779 this error is related to the thread in gevent, stil not working.
I solve this in the other thread, now zeronet is working on haiku os.
